channel.title: How I Make Shops?PLS HELP FAST!
channel.description: i wanna make a shop in ::staffzone i made one but when you try trade it, it does nothing please make a video or tell me how to do it i might make u mod on my server if u want and how i can run my server 24/7 i heard you can buy this thing and it run for you :|? umm please help thx ever1

item.title: How I Make Shops?PLS HELP FAST!
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

Why would we go through the trouble to make a video on how to make a NPC tradeable when there are hundreds of guides and questions on this same topic. If your going to run a server you must learn how to search for answers on your own. Learn the how to use Google and Moparscapes search bar.

I’ll spoon feed you just a little bit, the problem your having has to do with your client.java. Use common sence only cause you made the NPC spawn and made a new shop it doesn’t mean it will magically combine to your likes. There has to be a way where all the codes will come together and function properly. You basically tried to peal an apple and only got the knife and apple now you must put the knife to the apple and peal it. Hope I opened up your eyes.

Read full topic
